changes: Added functionality to copy localStorage, sessionStorage, and cookies from the active page.
Implemented Base64 encoding for clipboard export.
Added support to paste data only on the original site.
Restored localStorage and sessionStorage via injected page scripts.
Restored cookies via document.cookie for non-HttpOnly cookies.
Added validation to check origin match before pasting.
Displayed logs in the page console for full traceability.
Removed automatic new tab opening during paste.
